items.name: Apple
items.description: An apple is a sweet, edible fruit produced by an apple tree.

items.name: Banana
items.description: A banana is an edible fruit produced by several kinds of large herbaceous flowering plants in the genus Musa.

items.name: Grape
items.description: A grape is a fruit, botanically a berry, of the deciduous woody vines of the flowering plant genus Vitis.

items.name: Peach
items.description: The peach is a deciduous tree native to the region of Northwest China between the Tarim Basin and the north slopes of the Kunlun Mountains, where it was first domesticated and cultivated.

items.name: Melon
items.description: A melon is any of various plants of the family Cucurbitaceae with sweet edible, fleshy fruit.
